attributes.action: Intervene in the case of the abandoned spy Viktor Makarov
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Viktor Makarov was caught spying for Britain and sent to a labour camp. 

He has been paid £65,000 by the government, but the government has not made good on other promises such as a pension and this man now lives in poverty and is at risk from the Russian security services.

The Prime Minister should see that this man is looked after and rewarded for all the sacrifices he has made.
